title: Ultimate GoHighLevel Guide 2026: How To Use HighLevel For Beginners

As your business grows, and you add more people to your list, they all show up here and everything stays organized. Next up, pipelines. Here's where it gets really powerful. A lot of this movement can be automated. Once that trigger fires, here's what happens. The contact gets added to my sales pipeline in the new lead stage. Then they get an email thanking them for their interest. 5 minutes later, they get an SMS with a link to book a call. 3 minutes after that, if they haven't responded, they get an automated voicemail drop.
